data.text: @i_twert Hola, we are sorry for the delay in our response. We have answered your DM. Regards.
@venicequeen7115 Hola Brittney, we have answered your DM. Regards.
@Louie_Goldberg Hola Lou, we are sorry to read this. Could you send us more information by DM, please? Regards.
@LittleToyTom Hola Tom, could you send us the booking code and full name by DM, please? We remain at your disposal. Regards.
@JayTheCPA Hola Jay, we have answered your DM. Regards.

data.text: @LeslieKritzer We understand your frustration and we're doing our utmost in order to provide you with assistance from our end, Leslie. We appreciate your comprehension and patience. Regards
@SebaBlink Hola Sebastian, could you send us your booking code, ticket number and full name by direct message, please? Regards.
@AmandaM90946822 Hola Amanda, desculpe o atraso na nossa resposta, respondemos à sua mensagem directa.

@HMartinMedia Hola, please send us the details by DM, we don´t have any in our inbox, this is not a generic reply, we will gladly help if you send us your booking and contact details by DM. Thank you and stay safe. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@aalvarezmorin Hola, Ana. Nos sorprende lo que nos comentas. por favor envíanos un MD con todos los detalles del caso. De esta manera podemos revisar. Quedamos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.
@EngThamer_ Hola Thamer, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@venicequeen7115 Hola Brittney, we will contact you as soon as possible. Regards.
@HMartinMedia Hola, how we can help you? Could you send us a DM? Thank you.
@_Rosa_Blanca_ Hola Rosa, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@player_cole Hola, we have your DM, we will follow your case there. Regards.
@RepkoKarina We replied to your DM, please send the requested information. Regards.
@danielwales07 Thank you.
@danielwales07 Hola Daniel, we sent you a DM. Regards.

@PKK002 Hola Vicky, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM your booking information, code, ticket number, registered email and full contact number with international prefix? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@venicequeen7115 Thank you Brittney, we have replied your DM: Regards

@venicequeen7115 Hola Brittney, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us your booking details by DM , code, ticket number, registered email and phone contact number with international prefix to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@emilyomanahan Hola Emily, we are sorry to read this, could you please let us know by DM, the PIR code and full passenger name? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

data.text: @LeslieKritzer Hola Leslie, we are sorry to read this, we have escalated your case to the relevant department, as soon as we have an update, we'll contact you back. We really appreciate all your patience. Regards
@MyNameisDawew Hola Drew,  we have replied your DM, we'll continue through that channel. Regards
@trvsshaffer Hola Travis, we answered to your direct message, we kindly ask you to keep the conversation on that channel, in order to have all the details in the same chat. Kind regards.
@Azeeez925 Hola Azeez. We have answered your direct message. Kind regards.

@Tichke3 Hola Tichke. Have you opened an irregularity (PIR) at the airport? Could you please provide us, your full name and  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards

data.text: @SebaBlink Hola Sebastian. In this case, if you have added your fidelity number in your "manage my booking" area, you'd be able to select your seats at no fee once the online check-in window opens. Kind regards.

@BuckeyeTap Hola Buckeye. We have answered your direct message. As we mention there, you will need to contact our luggage centre in order to requesst a copy of this, to the available, provided lines. Kind regards.
@MyNameisDawew Hola Drew. We have answered your direct message. Kind regards.
@LynneEdwards2 Hola Lynne, we have answered your DM. Regards.
@Tichke3 Hola Tichke. We are sorry that on this occasion your experience has been negative. From this channel we are at your service for any query. Kind regards.
@kayjay_potato Hola, we have answered your DM. Regards.
🥇⏱✈️ First! The expert travel consultancy @cirium has just published the airline punctuality ranking and Iberia is ranked first in Europe and fifth in the world in August. All the info 👇
@LiStyleEngineer Hola Jovie, we suggest you to contact our staff at the airport to check the available options if that happens or please let us know the details by DM. Thank you.
@CMerged Hola Christian, please send us the PIR or report number, your complete name and all the details by DM. Thank you.
@Suk88996589 Hola Suk, could you send us the details and the report number to check this please? Thank you.
@schortre Hola , thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM your booking code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@AvgeekDyl1 Hola Dylan, thank you for contacting us, we have replied your DM requesting for your booking details, we'll continue through that channel. Regards
@FreezorgPls We are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM, we'll continue through that channel. Regards
@CLH92725676 Hola, we have replied your DM. We will continue the conversation there. Regards
@BenJLauz97 Hola Ben, please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1UII) with your booking code and ticket number (075******) so we can verify the options you have. We remain at your disposal, regards.

@FreezorgPls The terms and conditions of the voucher specify that they cannot be refunded, because they are considered a refund method. We are sorry we cannot tell you something different from this channel.

@JayTheCPA Hola Jay, we are going to help you from this channel. Please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with more details, including your booking code, ticket number (075******) and if you have the receipts for the purchase of the seats
@lunnarisxd Hola Lunna, we are sorry to hear this. Please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with more details of what happened so we can verify. We remain at your disposal, regards.

@FreezorgPls We are sorry we cannot tell you something different. The voucher is considered refund method, so a new one could not be processed. Remember that the vouchers are not nominative and can be used by any passenger who makes the purchase from our website https://t.co/v3M8UZqtKz.

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @MyNameisDawew Drew, did you open a claim here https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG? If so, please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with the case number (E********-********) so we can verify.
@uglypuglie Hola Frederic, from this channel we are going to help you. Please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with the case number so we can verify (2022****-********). Kind regards
@FreezorgPls Hola, we have answered your DM. Regards.
@NoemiVillarroe aguardamos detalles por tu parte. Saludos /2

@NoemiVillarroe Hola Noemi, hace díasnos contactaste e indicamos que era necesario consultaras un médico para continuar con cualquier tratamiento requerido. Entendemos han pasado más de 21 días desde la demora de tu equipaje ¿enviaste ya en algún punto documentación para el estudio de reembolso?
@FreezorgPls Hola, we don't know the details of your case. Could you send us more information by DM, please? Regards.
@LynneEdwards2 Hola Lynne, we have answered your DM. Regards.
@Mr_Egg87 Hola Edgardo, could you send us your PIR number, full name and case number (if you have one) by private message, please? Regards.
@NLCStweets Hola, unfortunately we don´t have access to that email, please insist writing again to the address, Thank you.
@Katya__maria Hello Katya, could you confirm your PIR or case number and complete name by DM? Thank you.
@danielwales07 Hola Daniel, we sent you a DM. Regards.

@chloelilia_ Hola Chloe, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your booking details, code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@kayjay_potato Khaoula, we have replied your DM.
@kayjay_potato Khaoula, please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with the claim reference (E********-********) so we can verify.

@danielwales07 Daniel, we are sorry we don´t have updates about your claim; we have asked our colleagues again for any update or response about your case, as soon as we hear back from them, we will contact you again.
@kayjay_potato Khaoula, did you proceed as we told you before?
@mlipsitch Thank you Marc, we have replied your DM. We will continue the conversation there.

@alvarohmaliaga Alvaro, lamentamos no poder indicar algo diferente a lo mencionado en mensajes previos; la agencia tiene canales habilitados para realizar las gestiones y es por esa vía que deberá solicitar el reembolso y las actualizaciones del mismo.

@jefflevy Thank you Jeff for the confirmation; we have checked and we see our colleagues are still working on your case; however, we have left a note asking for updates, as soon as we hear back from them we will contact you again.
@jefflevy Hola Jeff, we are sorry to hear this. Are you referring to the same flight for which you wrote us in DM?

@mlipsitch Hello Marc. Could you please provide us a direct message https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa with your full name, booking code, ticket number and file number of the calls so we'd be able to consult from here? Thank you and kind regards.

@Anthony1609 Hola Anthony1609. When making a booking through our website, you can check the details of any flight, including the Airline operative for your flight. We are sorry that on this occasion your experience has been negative. From this channel we are at your service for any query.

@mlipsitch Hola Marc. We are sorry to read about this. Since you bought via another platform, as it is a external purchase, you should consult with who managed, charged and issued your booking. That booking is issued from the system of that intermediary not ours. Kind regards,
@cryptoapenc Could you send us the flight details and what happened by DM please? Thank you.

urls.title: IBERIA.COM en United States - the best prices for Iberia flights
urls.description: Check the offers of cheap flights from the United States to more than 300 Iberia destinations in Spain, Europe, America and Asia, and reserve it at the best price

Kind Regards

urls.title: Travel restrictions due to COVID-19
urls.description: Check the regulations, requirements and restrictions for travel established by the different countries. Plan your flight ensuring that you meet all the requirements to make your international trip.

data.text:
@cryptoapenc Hola CryptoApe. We remind you that the current measures and regulations do not depend on the airline but directly on the health and government authorities of each country. For more information, please consult on the following link: https://t.co/tAXgHHuDbg
Kind regards,

@aschlutow3 in this case we would like you to indicate your PIR reference number and your full name to verify the data of your stroller. We look forward to your response by DM, regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@aschlutow3 Hola Alyssa, we are sorry to read about this incident, we would like to know if you have made the corresponding claim at the airport. We understand that they should be able to open your case for the search of the corresponding stroller, regards.

data.text: @bobvanduuren https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG Where with the data of your reservation and the details of the purchase of your seat request a refund, regards. /2

data.text: @LeslieKritzer Hola Leslie, we do not know the reason for your impression. If you have any pending queries with us we would like you to indicate all the details to assist you. We remain at your disposal, regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@KeithSchwebel Hola Keith. Could you please, provide us with your booking code via DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa), email address, and name as it appears on the booking, and ticket numbers so that we can review it? Regards.
